terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.mainTitle: Birthday Cake Reservation Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Please read and agree to the following before making your reservation

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellations made within 24 hours of your reservation will incur a ¥200 cancellation fee (payable via PayPay).

email.title: Email Address
email.content: Please provide a valid email address. If an incorrect address is provided, you will not receive the confirmation email and your reservation cannot be completed.

plateOnly.title: Plate Only Option
plateOnly.content: For the plate-only option, please select your cake in-store on the day of your visit. The price will vary depending on your selection.

arrival.title: Upon Arrival
arrival.content: Please inform the staff on the 1st floor of your reservation. For surprise celebrations, please notify the barista on the 3rd floor instead.

seating.title: Seating
seating.content: We do not accept table reservations. During busy periods, there may be a short wait for seating.

takeaway.title: Takeaway
takeaway.content: If you cannot finish your cake, you are welcome to take it home with you.

additional.title: Additional Orders
additional.content: You may order additional drinks and other items during your visit.

changes.title: Changes to Reservation
changes.content: If you wish to make changes to your reservation, please contact us by email or phone at least 24 hours before your scheduled visit.
